ranking.title: Auto Rank
ranking.selectSourceField: Select a field for ranking calculation
ranking.rankingFailedDesc: An error occurred during ranking calculation process
ranking.fetchRecordsFailedDesc: Unable to fetch table records, please check permissions
ranking.noValidDataDesc: No valid data found for ranking calculation
ranking.noValidDataCheckTable: Please check if the table has data
ranking.sameFieldError: Source field and target field cannot be the same
ranking.arrayFieldInfo: Lookup/Rollup fields will use the first value for ranking calculation process
ranking.arrayFieldExecuteWarning: Lookup/Rollup field detected. The first value will be used for ranking calculation process. Continue?
ranking.onlyOneField: Only one numeric field available. Create another field for ranking calculation results
ranking.groupFieldPlaceholder: Select the field to be used for grouping
ranking.groupingHint: Ranking calculation will be performed within each group separately
ranking.groupedRankingCompleteDesc: Successfully calculated ranking calculation for {count} records across {groups} groups
ranking.buttonDisabledHint: Please complete configuration first: select source field and target field
ranking.selectViewPlaceholder: Select a view to filter data scope
ranking.viewDescription: Select a view to filter data scope. Ranking calculation will only be performed on records in the selected view
